#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int compare(const void* a, const void* b) 
{
  return(*(int*)a - *(int*)b);
} 

int main(void)
{
	int foo[100], N, temp, T, i;
	
	scanf("%d",&T);
	
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&N);
		
		for(i=0; i<N; i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&temp);
			temp*=3;
			foo[i]=temp;
		}
		
		for(i=0; i<N; i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&temp);
			
			foo[i]+=temp;
		}
		
		qsort(foo, N, sizeof(int), compare);
		
		printf("%d\n",foo[N-1]);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
